QuestData.Title: Return to Camp
QuestData.Description: What do you think, $n? Maybe the High Commander will give me a few men to command.$B$BMaybe we can marshal a regiment together. What do you think?
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to High Commander Kamses at the Ramkahen Legion post.
QuestData.RewardText: Salhet? A tactician, you say?$B$BHah! Very well, if you'll vouch for him, we might be able to arrange something.
